TopicTitle: Make flags readable without a Kerbal nearby(and other flag peeves).

Articles.Content: Okay, so a couple days ago, I wanted a screenshot of a flag I had planted on a mission at the landing site, for my fanfic. I had forgotten to take a picture of its plaque when I planted it, and I wanted to go back to get a picture of the plaque. No problem, right? I went to the Tracking Station, and "flew" the flag. I right clicked on it. There was only Focus and Reset camera (if I remember correctly), no Read plaque option! It turns out that to read the plaque, I would have to send a Kerbal halfway around the world! I think that @SQUAD  should add command module functionality to flags so that we can read them without Kerbs around. Another suggestion: make flags editable. I made a few typos in my memorial flags, and now I can't fix them. Yes, yes, I should have looked it over, but my computer was running slow, and I'm impatient. Either way, making flags editable would be a good idea.
